author: Fox News
title: Pelosi: Important to understand the 'brilliance' of Biden's response to Russian invasion
description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi on Friday touted the “brilliance” of President Biden's response to a Russian invasion in Ukraine, telling reporters that his experience in government has helped him to understand “the arena."
